member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.VolkswagenBildungsinstitutGmbH.Reflector.#ctor(System.Int32)

member.name: P:Gadgeteer.Modules.VolkswagenBildungsinstitutGmbH.Reflector.LeftReflectorVoltage
member.summary: Gets the voltage of the sensors left reflector (from top in driving direction). The voltage is rising when the underground becames darker.

member.name: P:Gadgeteer.Modules.VolkswagenBildungsinstitutGmbH.Reflector.RightReflectorVoltage
member.summary: Gets the voltage of the sensors right reflector (from top in driving direction). The voltage is rising when the underground becames darker.

member.name: P:Gadgeteer.Modules.VolkswagenBildungsinstitutGmbH.Reflector.BatteryVoltage
member.summary: Gets the voltage from the UC Battery 4xAA Module.
